seo_meta.title: Phong Phan - Front-end Developer & Modern Web Architect
seo_meta.description: Building high-performance web applications using React, Next.js, and Headless CMS. Explore advanced techniques in modern front-end development.🚀
seo_meta.keywords: Front-end Developer, React, Next.js, Headless CMS, Web Development, JavaScript, TypeScript, Framer Motion, Tailwind CSS, Blog, Phong Phan Web Developer, Full-stack Developer , Modern Web, Performance Optimization

bannerHero.title: Welcome to My Portfolio
bannerHero.subtitle: Just an ordinary developer, crafting code with passion. From Vietnam with love.
bannerHero.description: Hello, I'm Phong! 👋, I'm a Web Developer who loves creativity and constantly explores new technologies. This website is a space where I store projects, ideas, and experiences I've gathered throughout my development journey. If you're also passionate about technology and enjoy discovering new things, you might find something interesting here. Welcome! 🚀

terminal.text1: ✔ A Web Developer who loves creativity & challenges.
terminal.text2: ✔ Passionate about React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS & Framer Motion.
terminal.text3: ✔ Crafting smooth UI animations & seamless experiences.
terminal.text4: ✔ Enthusiastic about gym, football, hiking & exploring the world.
terminal.text5: ✔ Hates boundaries, always seeks something new.
terminal.text6: If you love tech & creativity, you're in the right place!
terminal.text7: Welcome aboard! 🚀 Feel free to explore.

service.info: Web Developer passionate about animations, breaking the mold, and chasing the new. Code isn’t just functional—it should feel alive! 🚀
service.skeleton-1: There are tons of awesome frameworks like React, Angular, Vue, and Svelte that can make your life... easier (or a complete mess, depending on your code)! 😆
service.skeleton-3: Tailwind CSS is cool, you know
service.skeleton-4: I love React, Next.js, Tanstack Query, and Zustand.

about.title: About me
about.text-1: Hi there! I'm Phong Phan. My daily life revolves around coding, debugging, and tackling tech challenges. I'm a fast learner, always eager to explore new technologies, and I have a strong passion for problem-solving.
about.text-2: 🚀 I always try to learn and develop myself every day. Continuously learning and challenging myself will help me become a better programmer. Besides, I am also very interested in sharing knowledge and experience. I believe that sharing will help me learn more and also help others learn many things.
about.text-3: Beyond coding, I enjoy hitting the gym, playing football, mountain climbing, read book and traveling. Staying active keeps me balanced between work and life while fueling my creativity.
about.text-4: I'm always open to job opportunities that align with my skills and passions. Whether it's joining an innovative startup, working on groundbreaking projects, or collaborating with a top-notch team, I'm excited for new challenges. Let's build something amazing together! 🚀

technology.title: Technology Use
technology.description1: 🚀 Optimize UI for a better user experience – Smooth, fast, and visually appealing—because good design matters!
technology.description2: 🎨 Custom websites from idea to launch – Using React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS to build fast, responsive, and high-performance websites.
technology.description3: 🔥 Always up to date with new tech – Self-learning, experimenting, and applying fast to keep solutions modern and effective.
technology.description4: 💻 React, Next.js, Node.js – Self-taught and ready to build full-stack web applications.
technology.description5: 🎬 Framer Motion – Bringing animations to life with smooth scroll-based effects.
technology.description6: ⚡ Tailwind CSS – Utility-first styling for fast, clean, and intuitive UI building.

experience.title: Work experience
experience.description: 👨‍💻 With several years of experience in web development, I have participated in several projects building web applications and user interfaces, from small projects to complex projects. Gain knowledge and practical experience with a variety of web technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next.js, Node js, Headless CMS, and source code management tools such as Git and GitHub.

service.global: A website is essential in today's digital landscape because it serves as the primary online presence for businesses, organizations, and individuals. It provides a platform to showcase products, services, and information to a global audience, enhancing visibility and credibility. 🚀

description: This is a multilingual app built with Next.js 15 and next-intl.
genMoiton: GENMOTION UI – A UI library I built to store awesome animation components, helping you create smooth and beautiful interfaces with React, Framer Motion, and TypeScript. Super cool!

project.description: Welcome to my little “museum” of personal projects – from fun little UIs to fully functional websites running smooth as butter. Everything here is self-made, self-taught, and self-tested – some look shiny and polished, some only I would dare to compliment. 😅 Feel free to take a stroll around – who knows, you might like something!
